text:
Wanderu | Boston, MA | Onsite

Start-up disrupting the train/bus industry. Python, Go, Node, React, Neo4j, Postgres, MongoDB

Currently looking for:

- Senior Front End Engineer (Universal React, ES7, Node)

- Data Analyst (Postgres)

- Any other talented individuals who think our stack is pretty sweet!

Apply at jobs@wanderu.com and reference that you found our posting on Hacker News.
